DataElement.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Prior Craniospinal Administered Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator related to if patient has had prior Craniospinal radiation therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to prior Craniospinal radiation therapy having been administered.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: use PHOTOTHERAPY, LASER THERAPY, or ULTRAVIOLET THERAPY for therapeutic radiation with visible, laser, or ultraviolet light, respectively.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:Relating to the cranium and the spinal column.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: Relating to the cranium and the spinal column.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient received any prio
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any prior Craniospinal radiation therapy

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient receive the last dose of radiation (XRT) at least 3 months prior to study enrollment for craniospinal XRT?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient receive the last dose of any craniospinal radiation (XRT) more than 3 months prior to study enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient receive the last dose of craniospinal radiation at least 3 months prior to study enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF TEXT 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient have prior craniospinal XRT?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is radiation therapy the only other prior therapy received for the CNS malignancy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient receive the last dose of craniospinal irradiation or total body irradiation or radiation to >= 50% of pelvis > 3 months prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient receive the last dose of any craniospinal radiation (>24Gy) or total body irradiation or radiation to >= 50% of pelvis >= 42 days prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received any prior craniospinal radiation therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received craniospinal RT (or if greater than or equal to 50% radiation of pelvis) within the last 84 days?

DataElement.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
